name: Blow The Gate
description:
It's a game about blowing up the gates to help your subject mates!

You, as a Subject #001, you are an experimental square.
You are being used by a Robot, who is a lazy dog who can't even pay his rents.
As you play the maps, the Robot will do more and more experiments on you.
At the end, he finally reaches that he can pay his own rent.

You, as the Square Subject #001, you have to complete the maps that mr.weirdo robot gave you.

Have fun while playing the game!
